text.div:
SHR InterventionStatusCS CodeSystem

Value indicating whether an activity is currently being acted upon, represents future intentions or is now a historical record. From HL7 V3 Reference Information Model.

name: SHR InterventionStatusCS CodeSystem
title: SHR InterventionStatusCS CodeSystem
publisher: The MITRE Corporation: Standard Health Record Collaborative
description: Value indicating whether an activity is currently being acted upon, represents future intentions or is now a historical record. From HL7 V3 Reference Information Model.

concept.display: An intervention to avoid, something NOT to do.
concept.definition: An intervention to avoid, something NOT to do.

concept.display: Suggested or possible intervention, not necessarily accepted by patient or provider.
concept.definition: Suggested or possible intervention, not necessarily accepted by patient or provider.

concept.display: A course of action that has been rejected.
concept.definition: A course of action that has been rejected.

concept.display: Accepted and pending, scheduled, or waiting to start
concept.definition: Accepted and pending, scheduled, or waiting to start

concept.display: Overridden or otherwise not executable, e.g., entered in error
concept.definition: Overridden or otherwise not executable, e.g., entered in error
